item.description:
Weather update email from Jennifer from Friday Nov. 14

To all the hardy New
Hampshire soles and paws,
Well the weather states that it will rain tomorrow, but it'll be warm. So my
dogs and I will still be going to the park and hope you can make it also. So
the meetup will still be on. See you there, bring your rain coat and boots.
What's a bit of rain anyway???
jennifer



We'll be playing at the park Saturday afternoon for a few hours if you'd like to join us. The dogs have such a blast here and I think the humans do also. So if you can, come by for a bit or an hour. Bring water, treats, TOYS. ( perhaps some rubber balls...HA HA) If we do have really bad weather I will cancel, so check the website before leaving home. Hope to see you at the park. WOOF

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Saturday at the park.
